'''Olara''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Olara was part of the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/) expedition to the ruins of [Poko Kohara](/pokoKohara/). By prying the doors to the ruins, she awakened the titan, which forced the party to flee inside to relative "safety".

Once inside, she met a gruesome fate after being pushed into one of the spike traps by [Dueno](/dueno/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           = 
|stronghold      = 
|rest            = 
|quests_started  = 
|quests_involved = [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/)
|none            = 
|other           = 
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/): Her spirit can be first seen fleeing from the Engwithan Titan upon approaching the entrance to the [Engwithan Waystation](/engwithanWaystation/). She is then found impaled on a spike trap on level one.
[Category:Poko Kohara ruins characters](/categoryPokoKoharaRuinsCharacters/)

'''Olara''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Olara was part of the [[Vailian Trading Company]] expedition to the ruins of [[Poko Kohara]]. By prying the doors to the ruins, she awakened the titan, which forced the party to flee inside to relative "safety".

Once inside, she met a gruesome fate after being pushed into one of the spike traps by [[Dueno]].
